long_description: Secure your Sportube ski or snowboard case during travel with this Travel Sentry(R)-approved luggage lock. Lock is recognized and accepted by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA). TSA airport screeners have a secured set of codes to open Travel Sentry(R) locks, allowing access without damaging the lock. 3-digit combination can be set to your own unique number.
short_description: Secure your Sportube ski or snowboard case during travel with this Travel Sentry(R)-approved luggage lock.
